|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [deleteParameter(index)](./blockly.procedures_namespace.observableproceduremodel_class.deleteparameter_1_method.md) |  | Removes the parameter at the given index from the parameter list. |
|  [getEnabled()](./blockly.procedures_namespace.observableproceduremodel_class.getenabled_1_method.md) |  | Returns whether the procedure is enabled/disabled. If a procedure is disabled, all procedure caller blocks should be disabled as well. |
|  [getId()](./blockly.procedures_namespace.observableproceduremodel_class.getid_1_method.md) |  | Returns the unique language-neutral ID for the procedure. |
|  [getName()](./blockly.procedures_namespace.observableproceduremodel_class.getname_1_method.md) |  | Returns the human-readable name of the procedure. |
|  [getParameter(index)](./blockly.procedures_namespace.observableproceduremodel_class.getparameter_1_method.md) |  | Returns the parameter at the given index in the parameter list. |
|  [getParameters()](./blockly.procedures_namespace.observableproceduremodel_class.getparameters_1_method.md) |  | Returns an array of all of the parameters in the parameter list. |
|  [getReturnTypes()](./blockly.procedures_namespace.observableproceduremodel_class.getreturntypes_1_method.md) |  | <p>Returns the return type of the procedure.</p><p>Null represents a procedure that does not return a value.</p> |
|  [insertParameter(parameterModel, index)](./blockly.procedures_namespace.observableproceduremodel_class.insertparameter_1_method.md) |  | <p>Inserts a parameter into the list of parameters.</p><p>To move a parameter, first delete it, and then re-insert.</p> |
|  [setEnabled(enabled)](./blockly.procedures_namespace.observableproceduremodel_class.setenabled_1_method.md) |  | Sets whether this procedure is enabled/disabled. If a procedure is disabled all procedure caller blocks should be disabled as well. |
|  [setName(name)](./blockly.procedures_namespace.observableproceduremodel_class.setname_1_method.md) |  | Sets the human-readable name of the procedure. |
|  [setReturnTypes(types)](./blockly.procedures_namespace.observableproceduremodel_class.setreturntypes_1_method.md) |  | <p>Sets whether the procedure has a return value (empty array) or no return value (null).</p><p>The built-in procedure model does not support procedures that have actual return types (i.e. non-empty arrays, e.g. \['number'\]). If you want your procedure block to have return types, you need to implement your own procedure model.</p> |
